page.title: 02A parents view
page.content:
A look near John Wheeldon School (bottom left hand grid ) This is a built up area of Stafford,with a few open spaces and play parks.
There are a number of factories, ranging from the old established firm of Lotus, to the new industrial estate.Most of the property in this area is old, with a great number of terraced houses some of which are over 100 years old.Shopping facilities are extremely varied,but consisting mostly of the old "corner shop",where you are welcome to buy not only that loaf of bread you forgot but also for a good old natter.This is essentially an "old"community but for all that extremely lively.
